channel.title: radio on Dwarves Foundation
channel.description: Recent content in radio on Dwarves Foundation

item.title: React Native New Architecture
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Introducing react-native’s new architecture changes that boost performance, bringing react-native back into the race with Flutter Introduction of react-native React Native is a JavaScript framework for writing high-performance mobile apps that leverage iOS and Android native components.

item.title: Remix Versus Nextjs
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: A brief comparison between Remix and Next.js frameworks Introduction of Remix Remix describes itself as: Remix is an edge native, full-stack JavaScript framework for building modern, fast, and resilient user experiences.

item.title: Dwarves Radio Talk 16 Run An Effective Performance Review
item.author: han@d.foundation (Han Ngo)
item.description: Performance Review We perform bi-yearly reviews in July and January. The primary purpose of these reviews is to **give feedback **on career path advancement and recognize accomplishments.
